Battle Traits.name: MIGHTY DESTROYERS
Battle Traits.description: The Ironjawz won’t let anything get between them and a good scrap.
Battle Traits.declare: Pick a friendly IRONJAWZ unit that was not set up this turn to be the target.
Battle Traits.effect: The target can move up to 3". It can move into combat. If it was in combat at the start of the move, it must end that move in combat.
Battle Traits.when: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Hero Phase

Battle Traits.name: IRONJAWZ WAAAGH!
Battle Traits.description: With a roar that shakes the battlefield, the Ironjawz charge as one, eager to crack skulls.
Battle Traits.declare: Pick a friendly IRONJAWZ HERO to be the target.
Battle Traits.effect: For the rest of the turn, the following effects apply to friendly IRONJAWZ units while they are wholly within 18" of the target:Add 1 to charge rolls for those units.Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of those units’ melee weapons.
Battle Traits.when: Once Per Battle, Your Charge Phase

Battle Formations.name: NATURAL DISASTER
Battle Formations.description: A mass of heavily armoured orruks and their bulky beasts of war, an Ironjawz Brawl hits the enemy line like a landslide if it gains enough momentum, leaving a trail of carnage and blazing ruin in its wake.
Battle Formations.effect: If you make an unmodified charge roll of 8+ for a friendly non-HERO IRONJAWZ unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of that unit’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.

Battle Formations.name: SPIRIT OF GORK
Battle Formations.description: The roiling Waaagh! energy that emanates from the Weirdfist shamans fills nearby Ironjawz with the fighting spirit and hardiness of Gork.
Battle Formations.effect: Friendly IRONJAWZ INFANTRY units have WARD (6+) while they are wholly within 12" of any friendly IRONJAWZ WIZARDS or PRIESTS.

Battle Formations.name: SMASHIN’ AND BASHIN’
Battle Formations.description: The orruks of an Ironfist won’t be outdone by each other – when one mob duffs up the enemy, it inspires others to show them how to do it properly!
Battle Formations.effect: The first time each turn that an enemy unit is destroyed by a FIGHT ability used by a friendly IRONJAWZ unit, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by the next friendly IRONJAWZ unit that is picked to use a FIGHT ability for the rest of the turn.

Battle Formations.name: ’ERE WE COME!
Battle Formations.description: Once a grunta stampede gets going and the hogs are all riled up, there are few forces in the realms with the power to halt its momentum.
Battle Formations.effect: Add the number of enemy units that have been destroyed this battle to the Move characteristic of friendly Gore-gruntas and MAW-GRUNTA units, to a maximum of +4.

Heroic Traits.name: AN EYE FOR DA FIGHT
Heroic Traits.description: This orruk is among the most dangerous of their brutal kind one who instinctively understands the flow of battle and knows just where the best fights are likely to kick off.
Heroic Traits.effect: If you roll a 1-3 when determining the distance that unit can move, you can use a value of 4 instead.
Heroic Traits.when: Reaction: You declared the ‘Redeploy’ command for a friendly IRONJAWZ unit wholly within 12" of this unit

Heroic Traits.name: MEGA BOSSY
Heroic Traits.description: This boss’s booming voice constantly rings out across the battlefield, ‘encouraging’ their ladz to get krumpin’.
Heroic Traits.effect: If this unit charged this turn, for the rest of the turn, add 1 to charge rolls for friendly IRONJAWZ units while they are wholly within 18" of this unit.

Heroic Traits.name: HULKING BRUTE
Heroic Traits.description: Even by orruk standards, this boss is huge, and he is ever eager to throw his immense weight around in battle.
Heroic Traits.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
Heroic Traits.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. If this unit’s unmodified charge roll this turn was 8+, roll a D6 instead of a D3.

Artefacts of Power.name: TROPHY SKULLS
Artefacts of Power.description: Festooned with the skulls of those who crossed them, be they ferocious beast or mighty warrior, there’s no doubt that this orruk means business.
Artefacts of Power.effect: Add 10 to this unit’s control score.

Artefacts of Power.name: ARMOUR OF GORK
Artefacts of Power.description: This bashed-together armour is thick, heavy and possessed of its own fierce fighting spirit.

Artefacts of Power.name: AMBERBONE WHETSTONE
Artefacts of Power.description: This prized sharpening stone, laced with veins of realmstone, is found deep in the crags of Ghur. It is loved by the Ironjawz for its ability to make a weapon ‘ded sharp’.
Artefacts of Power.effect: Pick 1 of this unit’s weapons. Add 1 to the Rend characteristic of that weapon for the rest of the battle.

Spell Lore.name: BASH ’EM LADZ!
Spell Lore.description: Pulsing waves of Waaagh! energy radiate from the shaman, boosting the fighting prowess of nearby Ironjawz.
Spell Lore.declare: Pick a friendly IRONJAWZ WIZARD to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly IRONJAWZ unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Spell Lore.effect: The target’s melee weapons have CRIT (2 HITS) for the rest of the turn.

Spell Lore.name: MIGHTY ’EADBUTT
Spell Lore.description: The shaman headbutts the air, projecting a wave of green energy that seeks out enemies, especially spell-flingas, to nut.
Spell Lore.declare: Pick a friendly IRONJAWZ WIZARD to cast this spell, pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Spell Lore.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on the target. If the target is a WIZARD, inflict 3 mortal damage on the target instead.

Spell Lore.name: DA GREAT BIG GREEN HAND OF GORK
Spell Lore.description: A ghostly green hand picks up a mob of Ironjawz and plonks them back down where they are most needed.
Spell Lore.declare: Pick a friendly IRONJAWZ WIZARD to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly unit wholly within 12" of them and not in combat to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Spell Lore.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again wholly within 24" of the caster and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Prayer Lore.name: GET ’EM BEAT
Prayer Lore.description: A pounding rhythm is played by the Warchanter, inspiring nearby Ironjawz to wreak destruction and ruin upon their enemies.
Prayer Lore.declare: Pick a friendly IRONJAWZ PRIEST to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly IRONJAWZ unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Prayer Lore.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to charge rolls for the target. In addition, if the chanting roll was 8+, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a maximum of 3.

Prayer Lore.name: FIXIN’ BEAT
Prayer Lore.description: The Warchanter pounds a restorative rhythm that gives the ladz a second wind.
Prayer Lore.declare: Pick a friendly IRONJAWZ PRIEST to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly IRONJAWZ unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Prayer Lore.effect: Heal (D6) the target. If the chanting roll was 8+, HEAL (D3+3) the target instead.

Prayer Lore.name: KILLA BEAT
Prayer Lore.description: The Warchanter drums a thumping beat that causes raw Waaagh! energy to course through the weapons of the orruks.
Prayer Lore.declare: Pick a friendly IRONJAWZ PRIEST to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly IRONJAWZ unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Prayer Lore.effect: Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn. If the chanting roll was 10+, you can pick another eligible unit to be a second target.

Manifestation Lore.name: SUMMON FOOT OF GORK
Manifestation Lore.description: Stamping a furiously belligerent beat, the shaman dares Gork himself to stomp the battlefield flat.
Manifestation Lore.declare: If there is not a friendly Foot of Gork on the battlefield, pick a friendly IRONJAWZ WIZARD to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Set up a Foot of Gork wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units. A Foot of Gork has 2 parts that must be set up within 9" of each other.

Manifestation Lore.name: SUMMON MORKSPIT MARSH
Manifestation Lore.description: The shaman summons a cruel, glowing swamp that channels memories of Gorkamorka’s past brawls.
Manifestation Lore.declare: If there is not a friendly Morkspit Marsh on the battlefield, pick a friendly IRONJAWZ WIZARD to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Set up a Morkspit Marsh wholly within 18" of the caster and visible to them.

Manifestation Lore.name: SUMMON GORK-ROARA
Manifestation Lore.description: The shaman summons a leering visage of Gorkamorka that spills forth Waaagh! power.
Manifestation Lore.declare: If there is not a friendly Gork-Roara on the battlefield, pick a friendly IRONJAWZ WIZARD to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Set up a Gork-Roara wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Manifestation Lore.name: NOTORIOUS BOSSES
Manifestation Lore.description: It takes orruks of propa might and kunnin’ to keep a Big Waaagh! in line.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick up to 1 friendly non-UNIQUE BIG WAAAGH! IRONJAWZ HERO and up to 1 friendly non-UNIQUE BIG WAAAGH! KRULEBOYZ HERO that do not have a heroic trait to be the targets.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Give each target 1 heroic trait from the Big Waaagh! heroic traits.Designer’s Note: These heroic traits are given to the targets during the deployment phase, not during army composition.

Manifestation Lore.name: THE POWER OF THE WAAAGH!
Manifestation Lore.description: The power of Gorkamorka reaches a climax of violent energy when orruks gather as a Big Waaagh!.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick up to 1 friendly BIG WAAAGH! IRONJAWZ unit and up to 1 friendly BIG WAAAGH! KRULEBOYZ unit to be the targets.
Manifestation Lore.effect: The targets have the POWER OF THE WAAAGH! keyword for the rest of the battle round.
Manifestation Lore.when: Once Per Turn, Your Hero Phase

Manifestation Lore.name: POSSESSED BY THE POWER OF THE WAAAGH!
Manifestation Lore.description: When a Waaagh! really gets going, the orruks become a terrifying force to be reckoned with.
Manifestation Lore.effect: While a friendly unit has the POWER OF THE WAAAGH! keyword:If that unit has the IRONJAWZ keyword, add 1 to run rolls and charge rolls for that unit.If that unit has the KRULEBOYZ keyword, that unit’s attacks score critical hits on unmodified hit rolls of 5+.

Manifestation Lore.name: RALLY THE WARCLANS
Manifestation Lore.description: With a great bellow, the boss encourages a mob from the seemingly endless hordes to get stuck in.
Manifestation Lore.declare: If your general is on the battlefield, pick a friendly BIG WAAAGH! unit that started the battle with 3 or more models and that has been destroyed to be the target.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Set up a replacement unit with half the number of models from the target unit (rounding up) wholly within 12" of your general and more than 9" from all enemy units.
Manifestation Lore.when: Once Per Turn, Your Movement Phase

Manifestation Lore.name: TAKIN’ NAMES
Manifestation Lore.description: The best way to keep your position at the head of a rowdy orruk horde is by duffing up anyone who looks like a challenge.
Manifestation Lore.effect: If an enemy HERO is destroyed by this unit, this unit has the POWER OF THE WAAAGH! keyword for the rest of the battle.

Manifestation Lore.name: A PROPER SNEAK
Manifestation Lore.description: When they get their Mork muscles flexin’, this boss can even get the Ironjawz moving with a semblance of stealth.
Manifestation Lore.declare: You can use this ability if this unit has the POWER OF THE WAAAGH! keyword and a friendly unit has not used a BRUTAL KUNNIN’ ability this turn.
Manifestation Lore.effect: For the rest of the battle round, friendly BIG WAAAGH! units have WARD (5+) while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.
Manifestation Lore.when: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase

Manifestation Lore.name: DA OLD ONE-TWO
Manifestation Lore.description: This boss and their boyz are the masters at piling on the pain.
Manifestation Lore.declare: You can use this ability if this unit has the POWER OF THE WAAAGH! keyword and a friendly unit has not used a BRUTAL KUNNIN’ ability this turn.
Manifestation Lore.effect: For the rest of the battle round, friendly BIG WAAAGH! units’ melee weapons have CRIT (2 HITS) while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.
Manifestation Lore.when: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase

Manifestation Lore.name: GET KRUMPIN’!
Manifestation Lore.description: Watching this boss go to town on an unfortunate target gets the mobs under their command well up for a brawl.
Manifestation Lore.declare: You can use this ability if this unit has the POWER OF THE WAAAGH! keyword and a friendly unit has not used a BRUTAL KUNNIN’ ability this turn.
Manifestation Lore.effect: For the rest of the battle round, add 1 to wound rolls for combat attacks made by friendly BIG WAAAGH! units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.
Manifestation Lore.when: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase

Manifestation Lore.name: DA SNEAKY STAB-SLAB
Manifestation Lore.description: This simple slab of metal is bound by kunnin’ enchantments that turn the force of an enemy’s blows back against them.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Each time you make an unmodified save roll of 6 for a combat attack that targets this unit, inflict 1 mortal damage on the attacking unit after the FIGHT ability has been resolved.

Manifestation Lore.name: TWO HEADZ AS ONE
Manifestation Lore.description: Shamans conveying the Twin-Headed God’s will spur the ladz to commit acts of kunnin’ brutality – or brutal kunnin’ – as necessary.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick a friendly BIG WAAAGH! WIZARD to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly BIG WAAAGH! INFANTRY unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Manifestation Lore.effect: If the target is an IRONJAWZ unit, until the start of your next turn, add 3 to the target’s control score while it is wholly within 12" of any friendly KRULEBOYZ units.If the target is a KRULEBOYZ unit, until the start of your next turn, add 2" to the target’s Move characteristic while it is wholly within 12" of any friendly IRONJAWZ units.

Manifestation Lore.name: UNSTOPPABLE WAAAGH!-BEATS
Manifestation Lore.description: Warchanter’s manic percussion spreads a frenzy to their Gorkish and Morkish mates.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick a friendly BIG WAAAGH! PRIEST to chant this prayer, pick a visible friendly non-HERO BIG WAAAGH! INFANTRY unit that is in combat and wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Manifestation Lore.effect: The target can use 2 FIGHT abilities this turn. After the first is used, however, the target has STRIKE-LAST for the rest of the turn. If the chanting roll was 10+, you can pick another eligible unit to be a second target.

Manifestation Lore.name: SUMMON FOOT OF GORK
Manifestation Lore.description: Stamping a furiously belligerent beat, the shaman dares Gork himself to stomp the battlefield flat.
Manifestation Lore.declare: If there is not a friendly Foot of Gork on the battlefield, pick a friendly BIG WAAAGH! WIZARD to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Set up a Foot of Gork wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units. A Foot of Gork has 2 parts that must be set up within 9" of each other.

Manifestation Lore.name: INCESSANT DRIVE
Manifestation Lore.description: As the Stampede moves ever faster, they accrue more and more power and momentum.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Add 1 to the momentum scores of friendly MAW-GRUNTA units.
Manifestation Lore.when: End of the First Battle Round

Manifestation Lore.name: FAST AND FURIOUS
Manifestation Lore.description: Riders of the Grunta Stampedes compete to be the first to slam into the enemy, urging their porcine steed on with kicks, curses and much incoherent bellowing
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick a friendly non-HERO GRUNTA STAMPEDE unit to be the target.
Manifestation Lore.effect: The target can immediately use the ‘Normal Move’ ability as if it were your movement phase.

Manifestation Lore.name: MONSTROUS MOMENTUM
Manifestation Lore.description: The longer the Grunta Stampede goes on, the more it picks up speed…
Manifestation Lore.effect: Add the current battle round number to the Move characteristic of friendly GRUNTA STAMPEDE units.

Manifestation Lore.name: EATIN’ ON DA HOOF
Manifestation Lore.description: Maw-gruntas have mastered the art of feeding on the move, snatching up unlucky victims and mashing them between their oversized teeth as they hurtle onwards.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick a friendly GRUNTA STAMPEDE MONSTER that has not used a RAMPAGE ability this turn to use this ability, then pick a visible enemy unit in combat with it to be the target.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Roll a dice and add the momentum score of the unit using this ability to the roll. If the result exceeds the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.
Manifestation Lore.when: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase

Manifestation Lore.name: WALL OF HOGFLESH
Manifestation Lore.description: It is no easy thing to pick your target when the ground is shaking and several dozen tonnes of ironclad meat are thundering in your direction.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick a friendly GRUNTA STAMPEDE HERO to be the target.
Manifestation Lore.effect: For the rest of the battle, subtract 1 from hit rolls for shooting attacks that target that HERO while it is wholly within 6" of a friendly non-HERO GRUNTA STAMPEDE unit.

Manifestation Lore.name: GRUNTA WAAAGH!
Manifestation Lore.description: Just before the stampede crashes headlong into the enemy lines, the Tuskboss bellows a mighty ‘Waaagh!’, encouraging the ladz and their steeds cause as much carnage as possible with their impact.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick a friendly GRUNTA STAMPEDE HERO to be the target.
Manifestation Lore.effect: For the rest of the turn, the following effects apply to friendly GRUNTA STAMPEDE units while they are wholly within 18" of the target:You can re-roll charge rolls for those units.Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of those units’ Maw-grunta’s Trotters.Roll a D6 instead of a D3 when determining the amount of mortal damage inflicted by the ‘Goregrunta Charge’ ability of those units.
Manifestation Lore.when: Once Per Battle (Army), Your Charge Phase

Manifestation Lore.name: TROPHY HUNTA
Manifestation Lore.description: This heavily scarred orruk is always on the lookout for the largest and most ferocious beasts of the realms. After all, their skulls make the flashiest trophies!
Manifestation Lore.effect: This unit’s Pig-hakka has ANTI-MONSTER (+1 REND) and ANTI-WAR MACHINE (+1 REND).

Manifestation Lore.name: DA BOOM SKULL
Manifestation Lore.description: The Waaagh! magic imbued within this grunta skull amplifies the bearer’s voice into a thunderous roar that shakes the battlefield.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Pick an enemy unit in combat with that friendly unit to be the target and roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll.
Manifestation Lore.when: Reaction: You declared a command for a friendly GRUNTA STAMPEDE unit wholly within 18" of this unit

Manifestation Lore.name: LEGENDARY VANDALS
Manifestation Lore.description: Zoggrok’s Ironmongerz have inherited their boss’s taste for crushing not only their enemies but also their edifices and artifice too.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Melee weapons used by friendly ZOGGROK’S IRONMONGERZ units have ANTI-FACTION TERRAIN (+1 REND) and ANTI-WAR MACHINE (+1 REND).

Manifestation Lore.name: INTO DA BREACH!
Manifestation Lore.description: Zoggrok’s ladz live for the moment when it’s time to storm the enemy gates with every ounce of ferocity they can muster.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick a friendly ZOGGROK’S IRONMONGERZ unit that is more than 9" from any enemy units and had any damage points allocated to it this turn.
Manifestation Lore.effect: That unit can move D6". It cannot pass through the combat ranges of enemy units. It cannot end that move in combat.
Manifestation Lore.when: Once Per Turn (Army), End of Any Turn

Manifestation Lore.name: IRONCLAD SCRUMS
Manifestation Lore.description: Ardboyz share Zoggrok’s brutally pragmatic views on war, enough to advance on a fortress wall or artillery battery in some sort of defensive formation.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Friendly ZOGGROK’S IRONMONGERZ Ardboyz units with 3 or more models have WARD (5+) while they are wholly within 12" of a different friendly ZOGGROK’S IRONMONGERZ Ardboyz unit with 3 or more models.

Manifestation Lore.name: SHIELD OF SCRAP AND MUSCLE
Manifestation Lore.description: Zoggrok’s boyz believe it’s better to die fighting than to let anything distract their surly boss while he’s engaged in his destructive craft. After all, they’d suffer the consequences…
Manifestation Lore.effect: While a friendly Zoggrok Anvilsmasha is within the combat range of a friendly Ardboyz unit:That Zoggrok Anvilsmasha has WARD (4+).Each time you make a successful ward roll for that Zoggrok Anvilsmasha, allocate 1 damage point to a friendly Ardboyz unit within its combat range after the damage sequence has been resolved (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

Manifestation Lore.name: OI! BACK TO IT!
Manifestation Lore.description: A harsh bark from Zoggrok or his enforcers can put steel into the spine of any orruk.
Manifestation Lore.effect: If a friendly ZOGGROK’S IRONMONGERZ Ardboyz or Brutes unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

Manifestation Lore.name: DA GREAT WOLLOPA
Manifestation Lore.description: Infused with the arcane indignation of the Waaagh!, da Great Wollopa is good for krumpin’ whatever needs krumpin’.
Manifestation Lore.effect: If any damage points are allocated to an enemy unit by attacks made by this unit, that enemy unit is krump’d until the start of your next turn.While a unit is krump’d:Subtract 1 from save rolls for that unit.Ignore positive modifiers to save rolls for that unit.

Manifestation Lore.name: THE GREEN GOD’S HAMMER
Manifestation Lore.description: At the urging of the Weirdnobs, Waaagh! energy surrounding the Ironmongerz pounds like a hammer on an anvil.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick a friendly ZOGGROK’S IRONMONGERZ WIZARD to cast this spell, pick a visible friendly ZOGGROK’S IRONMONGERZ INFANTRY unit wholly within 12" of them to be the target, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a maximum of 3.

Manifestation Lore.name: GET ’EM, GORK!
Manifestation Lore.description: The bellowing and pounding of an Ironmongerz Warchanter can see Gork’s divine belligerence unleashed upon enemy battlements.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick a friendly ZOGGROK’S IRONMONGERZ PRIEST to chant this prayer, then make a chanting roll of D6.
Manifestation Lore.effect: If the chanting roll was 5-9, pick a visible terrain feature wholly within 12" of the chanter. If the chanting roll was 10+, pick a visible terrain feature wholly within 18" of the chanter instead. That terrain feature is trampled by Gork for the rest of the battle.Roll a D3 each time an enemy unit starts or ends a move within 6" of a terrain feature that is trampled by Gork. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that enemy unit equal to the roll.

Manifestation Lore.name: SUMMON GORK-ROARA
Manifestation Lore.description: The shaman summons a leering visage of Gorkamorka that spills forth Waaagh! power.
Manifestation Lore.declare: If there is not a friendly Gork-Roara on the battlefield, pick a friendly ZOGGROK’S IRONMONGERZ WIZARD to cast this spell, then make a casting roll of 2D6.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Set up a Gork-Roara wholly within 12" of the caster, visible to them and more than 9" from all enemy units.

Manifestation Lore.name: CHARGE
Manifestation Lore.description: With a mighty battle cry, the warriors charge into combat with the enemy.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat and has not used a RUN or RETREAT ability this turn to use this ability. Then, make a charge roll of 2D6.
Manifestation Lore.effect: That unit can move a distance up to the value of the charge roll. That unit can move through the combat ranges of any enemy units and must end that move within 1/2" of a visible enemy unit. If it does so, the unit using this ability has charged.

Manifestation Lore.name: WARD SAVE
Manifestation Lore.description: Whether through their uncanny reflexes, unnatural toughness or a source of mystical protection, these warriors can avoid otherwise lethal attacks.
Manifestation Lore.effect: In step 1 of the damage sequence (see 18.0), make a ward roll of D6 for each damage point in this unit’s damage pool. If the roll equals or exceeds this unit’s ward value, remove that damage point from the damage pool.

Manifestation Lore.name: REDEPLOY
Manifestation Lore.description: Taking initiative, the warriors hastily reposition to respond to enemy movements.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Each model in that unit can move up to D6". That move cannot pass through or end within the combat range of an enemy unit.

Manifestation Lore.name: MYSTIC SHIELD
Manifestation Lore.description: The caster's allies are bathed in an unearthly glow that protects them from harm.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick a visible friendly unit wholly within 12" of this WIZARD to be the target. Then, make a casting roll of 2D6.
Manifestation Lore.effect: The target has WARD (6+) this turn.

Manifestation Lore.name: RESURRECTION
Manifestation Lore.description: A fallen hero is brought back from death, their vitality fully restored.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Make a chanting roll of D6.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Pick a friendly INFANTRY HERO that has been slain and return them to the battlefield. Set up that HERO wholly within 3" of this PRIEST.
Manifestation Lore.when: Once Per Battle, Your Hero Phase

Manifestation Lore.name: NORMAL MOVE
Manifestation Lore.description: The warriors advance across the battlefield.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
Manifestation Lore.effect: That unit can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. That unit cannot move into combat during any part of that move.

Manifestation Lore.name: RUN
Manifestation Lore.description: The unit rushes into position.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Make a run roll of D6. That unit can move a distance up to its Move characteristic added to the run roll. That unit cannot move into combat during any part of that move.

Manifestation Lore.name: RETREAT
Manifestation Lore.description: The fighters disengage from combat, though at the cost of lowering their defences.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is in combat to use this ability.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Inflict D3 mortal damage on that unit. That unit can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. That unit can move through the combat ranges of any enemy units but cannot end that move within an enemy unit’s combat range.

Manifestation Lore.name: RALLY
Manifestation Lore.description: With an inspiring call to action, wounded soldiers get a second wind and fresh troops take the field to replace their fallen comrades.
Manifestation Lore.declare: Pick a friendly unit that is not in combat to use this ability.
Manifestation Lore.effect: Make 6 rally rolls of D6. For each 4+, you receive 1 rally point. Rally points can be spent in the following ways:For each rally point spent, Heal (1) that unit.You can spend a number of rally points equal to the Health characteristic of that unit to return a slain model to that unit.You can spend the rally points in any combination of the above. Unspent rally points are then lost.

warscrolls.unit_description: Only the toughest of Ardboyz survive long enough to become a Big Boss. These formidable warriors can turn a horde of boisterous orruks into a disciplined killing machine that advances forward in a semblance of formation before crashing into the enemy like an armoured fist.

abilities.name: IRON-FISTED COMMANDER
abilities.description: No Ardboy would dare quit the fight with the boss around.
abilities.effect: If a friendly Ardboyz unit wholly within 12" of this unit uses the ‘Rally’ command, you can make 3 additional rally rolls of D6.

abilities.name: GET BASHIN’!
abilities.description: Shields are made for krumping in the eyes of a Big Boss, who makes sure their boys are using them the ‘propa way’.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to shield bash rolls for friendly Ardboyz units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit.

warscrolls.notes: This HERO can join an eligible regiment as a Headstompa.

warscrolls.unit_description: Clad in layers of thick iron and wielding massive weapons, Megabosses lead the charge of the Ironjawz warclans. The very act of fighting empowers these barbarous warlords. Once in the midst of combat, they are almost impossible to slay.

abilities.name: STRENGTH FROM VICTORY
abilities.description: The more fights a Megaboss wins, the stronger they become.
abilities.effect: If any damage points were allocated to an enemy unit by this unit’s combat attacks this turn and that enemy unit has been destroyed, give this unit a Waaagh! token, to a maximum of 3.Until the end of the next turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s weapons for each Waaagh! token it has.

abilities.name: LEAD DA BRUTES
abilities.description: Megabosses stride into battle flanked either side by the toughest and meanest Brutes.
abilities.effect: Pick a friendly BRUTE unit that has not used a FIGHT ability this turn and is within this unit’s combat range to be the target. The target can be picked to use a FIGHT ability immediately after the FIGHT ability used by this unit has been resolved. If it is picked to do so, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the target’s melee weapons for the rest of the turn.
abilities.when: Reaction: You declared a FIGHT ability for this unit

warscrolls.notes: This HERO can join an eligible regiment as a Headstompa.

warscrolls.unit_description: The booming rhythm of a Warchanter’s drumming draws orruks to battle from miles around. As the tempo of violence increases, so does the furious energy of the Warchanter’s beat, driving nearby Ironjawz into a destructive frenzy.

abilities.name: RHYTHM OF DESTRUCTION
abilities.description: With each enemy skull caved in by the Warchanter’s Gorkstikk and Morkstikk, the febrile energy of the Waaagh! begins to build.
abilities.effect: If any enemy models were slain this turn by this unit’s combat attacks, give this unit D3 ritual points.

warscrolls.unit_description: With crackling green light spilling from their eyes, Weirdnob Shamans channel the savage energy of the Waaagh!. In battle, they unleash this power with glee, letting loose blasts of searing force that tear through the enemy ranks like a choppa through flesh.

abilities.name: BRUTAL POWER
abilities.description: A Weirdnob Shaman channels the Waaagh! energy emitted by nearby orruk mobs.
abilities.effect: Add 1 to this unit’s power level while there are any friendly IRONJAWZ units that have 10 or more models wholly within 12" of it.

warscrolls.unit_description: Accompanied by his rockbrow squig companion, Zoggrok Anvilsmasha commands the power of Gorkamorka. The weapons of nearby orruks are bolstered until they glow green-hot with raging Waaagh! energy, while the choppa he wields in battle can shatter any protective charms or wards.

abilities.name: POWER OF DA GREAT GREEN GOD
abilities.description: Channelling the raw energies of the Waaagh! with his ‘bashin’ tools’, Zoggrok can empower the weapons of orruks gathered around him.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible friendly IRONJAWZ INFANTRY unit wholly within 12" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Make a forgin’ roll of D6. Add 1 to the roll if this unit is armed with Grunta-tongs. On a 4+, the target’s melee weapons have Crit (Mortal) until the start of your next turn.

abilities.name: KLONK
abilities.description: This rockbrow squig’s headache is only relieved by a bash on the head, making it the perfect portable anvil.
abilities.effect: Klonk is a token. You can re-roll forgin’ rolls for this unit while this unit’s Klonk is on the battlefield. If you make an unmodified save roll of 1 for this unit, remove this unit’s Klonk from the battlefield after the ATTACK ability has been resolved (the damage point is still inflicted).

abilities.name: WARD-SMASHING CHOPPA
abilities.description: A strike from this choppa shatters not only skulls but also arcane wards and other mystical forms of protection.
abilities.effect: If an attack made with this unit’s Ward-smashing Choppa scores a hit, the target has the WARD-SMASHED keyword for the rest of the battle. Ward rolls cannot be made for a WARD-SMASHED unit.

warscrolls.notes: This HERO can join an eligible regiment as a Headstompa.

warscrolls.unit_description: Gordrakk is the mightiest of all orruks, a living embodiment of the power of Gorkamorka. From atop his armoured Maw-krusha, Bigteef, the Fist of Gork fights at the head of his Great Waaagh!, brutally crushing the mightiest enemy warriors.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of Bigteef’s Fists and Tail is 6.

abilities.name: STRENGTH FROM VICTORY
abilities.description: The more fights a Megaboss wins, the stronger they become.
abilities.effect: If any damage points were allocated to an enemy unit by this unit’s combat attacks this turn and that enemy unit has been destroyed, give this unit a Waaagh! token, to a maximum of 3.Until the end of the next turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s weapons for each Waaagh! token it has.

abilities.name: VOICE OF GORK
abilities.description: Gordrakk’s bellow carries the elemental force of his god; it inspires Ironjawz to surge toward the enemy, hacking, bludgeoning and stomping with furious abandon.
abilities.effect: Until the start of your next turn, add 1 to hit rolls for combat attacks made by friendly IRONJAWZ units while they are wholly within 18" of this unit.
abilities.when: Once Per Battle, Reaction: You declared a WAAAGH! ability

abilities.name: MONSTER GRAPPLE
abilities.description: Gordrakk’s Maw-krusha, Bigteef, is strong and mean enough to wrestle even the most gigantic rivals into the dirt.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy MONSTER in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. On a 3+, pick 1 of the target’s weapons. You must pick a Companion weapon if it has any. Halve the Attacks characteristic of that weapon (rounding up) for the rest of the turn.
abilities.when: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

warscrolls.unit_description: One of the most destructive races to have ever lived, the Drogrukh were centauroid warriors who built a great nation in the Realm of Beasts. From their number rose a champion so powerful that he ascended to godhood: Kragnos, the End of Empires. Having led his people in warfare against a draconic empire that left the Drogrukh all but extinct, Kragnos was sealed away for the protection of the realms – only to be freed centuries later.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of The Dread Mace is 4 and this unit has a Control characteristic of 10.

abilities.name: RAMPAGING DESTRUCTION
abilities.description: Kragnos rampages through the press of his foes, his hooves flattening all in his path.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this phase, pick 1 of the following effects:Roll a dice for each enemy unit within 1" of this unit. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.Pick an enemy MONSTER in combat with this unit and roll 2D6. On a 7, this ability has no effect. Otherwise, inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the results on the dice used for the 2D6 roll multiplied together. For example, a 2D6 roll of 2 and 6 would inflict 12 mortal damage (2 × 6).
abilities.when: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase

abilities.name: THE END OF EMPIRES
abilities.description: Where Kragnos goes, the hordes of Destruction follow.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for friendly DESTRUCTION units while they are wholly within 12" of this unit, to a maximum of 3.

abilities.name: THE SHIELD INVIOLATE
abilities.description: Tuskbreaker has the power to guard Kragnos against even the most potent magical force.
abilities.effect: If this unit was picked to be the target of that spell, roll a dice. On a 3+, ignore the effect of that spell on this unit. This unit can use this ability more than once per phase but only once per SPELL ability.
abilities.when: Reaction: Opponent declared a SPELL ability

abilities.name: AVATAR OF DESTRUCTION
abilities.description: Kragnos is the embodiment of Ghur’s relentless ferocity. No single strike can lay him low.
abilities.effect: If this unit would be automatically destroyed, it is not automatically destroyed. Instead, allocate 6 damage points to it (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points).

warscrolls.unit_description: A charging Maw-krusha is a terrifying force of destruction, capable of pulverising entire formations single-handedly. The Megabosses that ride these beasts are amongst the most deadly of their kind, inspiring their ladz through feats of excessive brutality.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Maw-krusha’s Fists and Tail is 5.

abilities.name: STRENGTH FROM VICTORY
abilities.description: The more fights a Megaboss wins, the stronger they become.
abilities.effect: If any damage points were allocated to an enemy unit by this unit’s combat attacks this turn and that enemy unit has been destroyed, give this unit a Waaagh! token, to a maximum of 3.Until the end of the next turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of this unit’s weapons for each Waaagh! token it has.

abilities.name: DESTRUCTIVE BULK
abilities.description: A Maw-krusha is an unstoppable avalanche of ill-tempered muscle that turns all in its path into pulverised meat.
abilities.effect: If this unit charged this turn, roll a D3. On a 2+, this unit can move 2D6". It can pass through the combat ranges of enemy units and can end that move in combat. Then, pick an enemy unit that this unit passed across during that move. Inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the D3 roll. If that enemy unit is INFANTRY, double the mortal damage inflicted.
abilities.when: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

warscrolls.unit_description: To claim the title of Tuskboss, an orruk must display an almost unbelievable lack of concern for their own life. Not only do these orruk warlords have to somehow dominate a slobbering, foul- tempered Maw-grunta without being impaled, stomped on or hurled into a rocky wall with back-breaking force, they must also corral an entire herd of the beasts – as well as the rambunctious orruks who ride them into battle. Never stopping for a moment longer than it takes to rip a foe’s guts out with a swipe of their trusty pig-hacka, a Tuskboss rampages across the realms in an endless stampede, trampling all before them into gory paste.

abilities.name: BATTLE DAMAGED
abilities.effect: While this unit has 10 or more damage points, the Attacks characteristic of its Maw-grunta’s Tusks is 3.

abilities.name: HEAD OF THE STAMPEDE
abilities.description: At the forefront of a grunta stampede rides the Tuskboss, racing to be the first to the fray.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick up to 3 friendly MAW-GRUNTA units wholly within 12" of this unit that charged this turn to be the targets.
abilities.effect: Add 1 momentum point to each target.
abilities.when: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Charge Phase

abilities.name: UNSTOPPABLE MOMENTUM
abilities.description: Once a Maw-grunta begins its charge, it can only stop by crashing into something, and it becomes ever more deadly as its speed increases.
abilities.effect: Each time this unit has charged as a result of using a CHARGE ability, it gains 1 momentum point.Each time it uses a RUN ability, it gains 2 momentum points. It can have a maximum of 3 momentum points at once.Add the number of momentum points this unit has to the Damage characteristic of its Maw-grunta’s Tusks. At the end of each battle round, subtract 1 from its momentum points, to a minimum of 0.

warscrolls.regiment_options: Any Maw-grunta Gougers, Any Maw-grunta with Hakkin’ Krew, Any CAVALRY
warscrolls.notes: This HERO can join an eligible regiment as a Tusk Wrangler.

warscrolls.unit_description: Brutish snorting and ground-shaking hoofbeats herald the approach of the Gore-gruntas. The charge of these beasts hits home like the fist of Gorkamorka himself, their orruk riders bellowing war cries as they add their own might to the slaughter.

abilities.name: GORE-GRUNTA CHARGE
abilities.description: Even by the destructive standards of the Ironjawz, the carnage caused by a Gore-grunta charge is horrific to behold.
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this phase, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a D3. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Add 1 to the mortal damage inflicted (if any) if the target is CAVALRY.

warscrolls.unit_description: Mobs of Ardboyz plough into the fray to the sound of booming war drums and the clatter of heavy iron plate. Each Ardboy is a ferocious, battle-scarred fighter, smashing their way through the ranks of the enemy with a variety of crude but deadly weapons.

abilities.name: SHIELD BASH
abilities.description: The shields carried by Ardboyz are great slabs of iron festooned with spikes and metal teeth, making them deadly weapons in their own right.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit within 1" of this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Make a shield bash roll of D6 for each model in this unit that is within 3" of the target. For each 6+, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.

warscrolls.unit_description: Taking up huge, two-handed weapons and eschewing the armour typically worn by Brutes, Brute Ragerz hurl themselves at the biggest and meanest foes. Having previously suffered a humiliating defeat in battle, they are determined to prove just how ’ard they really are.

abilities.name: UNLEASHED RAGE
abilities.description: Brute Ragerz waste no time in venting their pent-up rage when they get within striking distance of the foe.
abilities.effect: This unit has STRIKE-FIRST if it charged in the same turn.

abilities.name: BERSERKERS
abilities.description: These Brutes forego heavy armour, which means they can get stuck in to the fighting as quickly as possible.
abilities.effect: This unit can use a RUN ability and still use CHARGE abilities later in the turn.

warscrolls.unit_description: Charging into battle with joyous bellows, Brutes seek out the largest enemies to batter into submission. Wearing the thickest armour and wielding huge weapons, they enjoy nothing more than dishing out a good and proper bashing.

abilities.name: YOU MESSIN’?
abilities.description: Most beings with half an ounce of common sense swiftly wither under the furious gaze of an orruk Brute who has marked their territory.
abilities.effect: Enemy models with a Health characteristic of 1 or 2 cannot contest objectives while they are in combat with this unit.

warscrolls.unit_description: Sent into a maddening frenzy by the Waaagh!, Weirdbrute Wrekkaz carve a path of destruction through the enemy lines. Their maniacal nature numbs them to all but the most grievous of wounds, ensuring carnage is unleashed upon the foe in all directions before they are finally laid low.

abilities.name: BERSERKERS
abilities.description: These Brutes forego heavy armour, which means they can get stuck in to the fighting as quickly as possible.
abilities.effect: This unit can use a RUN ability and still use CHARGE abilities later in the turn.

warscrolls.unit_description: Everyone agrees that Gurzag Ironskull’s Ardboyz are the toughest orruks around. Anyone foolish enough to challenge this notion is likely to receive a bone-crushing headbutt from Gurzag or otherwise be bashed and hacked to pieces by his warriors.

abilities.name: DEAD ’ARD
abilities.description: Whether through natural hardiness or sheer belligerence, Ironskull and his boyz fight on through the most grievous wounds, hollering and cheering as they batter their foes into the ground.
abilities.effect: Subtract 1 from wound rolls for attacks that target this unit.

warscrolls.unit_description: The Brute Boss Morgok was chosen by the living mountain known as the Beastgrave, though whether as dinner or as a champion remains unclear. He and his cronies, ’Ardskull and Thugg, are formidable opponents.

abilities.name: IN THEIR ELEMENT
abilities.description: Morgok and his mob hunt down the most fearsome monsters in Ghur, growing more ferocious and belligerent with each such creature they smash and hack to bits.
abilities.effect: The first time an enemy MONSTER is destroyed by this unit, add 1 to wound rolls for this unit’s attacks for the rest of the battle.

warscrolls.unit_description: Having managed against the odds to acquire a Maw-grunta mount, Maw-grunta Gougers gather together into stampeding mobs, the monstrous hogs trampling enemies into the mud and crushing them to a bloody pulp beneath their cloven hooves.

abilities.name: UNSTOPPABLE MOMENTUM
abilities.description: Once a Maw-grunta begins its charge, it can only stop by crashing into something, and it becomes ever more deadly as its speed increases.
abilities.effect: Each time this unit has charged as a result of using a CHARGE ability, it gains 1 momentum point.Each time it uses a RUN ability, it gains 2 momentum points. It can have a maximum of 3 momentum points at once.Add the number of momentum points this unit has to the Damage characteristic of its Maw-grunta’s Tusks. At the end of each battle round, subtract 1 from its momentum points, to a minimum of 0.

abilities.name: FLATTENED INTO THE MUD
abilities.description: Should a foe miraculously survive the impact of a charging Maw-grunta, it will take some time for them to regather their wits!
abilities.declare: If this unit charged this turn, pick an enemy unit within 1" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice and add the number of momentum points this unit has to the roll. On a 5+, the target has STRIKE-LAST for the rest of the turn.
abilities.when: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

warscrolls.unit_description: With eager crews of Ardboyz precariously chained to their flanks, these fearsome Maw-gruntas are one of the most devastating engines of war in the Ironjawz’ arsenal. As the porcine beasts careen headlong into the foe, they leave carnage and destruction in their wake.

abilities.name: CARVE A PATH
abilities.description: The job of the hakkin’ krew is to clear a path through packed enemies to ensure the Maw-grunta maintains its momentum.
abilities.effect: If this unit is in combat, it can move a distance up to its Move characteristic. It can pass through models and the combat ranges of enemy units, but it cannot end that move in combat.Then, pick each enemy unit that this unit passed across during that move to be the targets. Roll a D3 for each target. On a 2+, inflict an amount of mortal damage on the target equal to the roll. Then, this unit gains 2 momentum points.
abilities.when: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Movement Phase

abilities.name: UNSTOPPABLE MOMENTUM
abilities.description: Once a Maw-grunta begins its charge, it can only stop by crashing into something, and it becomes ever more deadly as its speed increases.
abilities.effect: Each time this unit has charged as a result of using a CHARGE ability, it gains 1 momentum point.Each time it uses a RUN ability, it gains 2 momentum points. It can have a maximum of 3 momentum points at once.Add the number of momentum points this unit has to the Damage characteristic of its Maw-grunta’s Tusks. At the end of each battle round, subtract 1 from its momentum points, to a minimum of 0.

warscrolls.unit_description: Filled with the raucous energy of Gork, Bossrokks make excellent vantage points from which an Ironjawz boss can bully magic itself into submission. An orruk who stands upon its platform finds their boisterous yelling and ill-tempered insults carrying far across the battlefield, crashing down on both friend and foe like the fist of the Great Green God. To other Ironjawz, this is a clear sign of their chieftain’s inherent bossiness – while the Waaagh!- fury that emanates from these towers soon gets them in the mood to trample and crush.

abilities.name: MAN DA TOWER!
abilities.description: Orruk bosses know they look dead impressive when lording it up from an idol of their god.
abilities.effect: While this terrain feature has a Shouty Boss:The Shouty Boss cannot use MOVE abilities.Instead of measuring range or visibility to and from the Shouty Boss, measure to and from this terrain feature instead.All attacks that would target the Shouty Boss target this terrain feature instead.If this terrain feature is destroyed, before removing it from the battlefield, inflict D3 mortal damage on the Shouty Boss. Then, set up the Shouty Boss on the battlefield within 3" of this terrain feature and not in combat.That unit is no longer the Shouty Boss. If it is not possible to set up the Shouty Boss, it is slain.

abilities.name: UP WE GO!
abilities.description: The orruk hauls themselves up to the idol’s platform.
abilities.declare: If this terrain feature does not have a Shouty Boss, pick a friendly IRONJAWZ INFANTRY HERO that is not in combat and is within 3" of it to be the target.
abilities.effect: Place the target on this terrain feature. The target is now a Shouty Boss (see ‘Man da Tower!’).

abilities.name: I’M OFF!
abilities.description: The orruk makes a quick exit.
abilities.effect: If this terrain feature has a Shouty Boss that was not placed on it this turn, set up the Shouty Boss on the battlefield wholly within 6" of this terrain feature and not in combat. That unit is no longer a Shouty Boss.

abilities.name: AGGRESSIVELY BOSSY
abilities.description: Commands and insults bellowed from around this tower seem to carry extra weight.
abilities.declare: Pick a visible enemy unit within 18" of this terrain feature to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. Add 1 to the roll if this terrain feature has a Shouty Boss. On a 4+, pick 1 of the following effects to apply to the target until the start of your next turn:Dat’s Ours, Ya Git!: Subtract 3 from the target’s control score.Zog Off Wiv Ya Magic!: Subtract 1 from casting rolls and/or chanting rolls for the target.Oi! Hold It!: Subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for the target, to a minimum of 1.
abilities.when: Once Per Turn, Your Hero Phase

warscrolls.unit_description: No spell is as beloved of orruk-kind as the Foot of Gork. It is brutality made manifest: a huge, warty green foot formed of riotous magic that descends from the sky and squashes anything beneath it flat. One foot follows the descent of the other, smashing colossal craters in the earth that glow with a weird Waaagh!-light. The fact that the Foot of Gork is almost impossible to direct once it has landed doesn’t much bother the orruks, for wherever it stomps, it’s bound to result in a good time.

abilities.name: MULTIPLE PARTS
abilities.effect: When a number of damage points equal to this MANIFESTATION’s Health characteristic are allocated to it, this MANIFESTATION is destroyed and all its parts are removed from play.

abilities.name: WANDERING DESTRUCTION
abilities.description: You can’t expect Gork to stand still when there’s fighting about.
abilities.declare: Pick a part of this MANIFESTATION to be the target.
abilities.effect: Remove the target from the battlefield and set it up again on the battlefield wholly within 9" of the other part of this MANIFESTATION.Then, roll a D3 for each enemy unit within 3" of the target. On a 2+:Inflict an amount of mortal damage on that unit equal to the roll.That unit has the STOMPED keyword until the start of your next turn.Subtract 1 from the number of dice rolled when making charge rolls for STOMPED units, to a minimum of 1.
abilities.when: Once Per Turn, Your Movement Phase

warscrolls.unit_description: From the jaws of a Gork-Roara spews forth the destructive magic of the Waaagh!. Shamans who breathe in this glowing mist find their connection to that primal energy heightened – all for the measly risk of being driven entirely out of their minds. Gork-Roaras share the orruks’ exuberance in battle, howling bloodthirsty invective and jeering battle cries. Should they linger after the din of combat has faded, they will bellow and howl in indignation. Given that the same is true of especially warlike bosses, no orruk really seems to mind.

abilities.name: BELLOWING WAAAGH!-CRIES
abilities.description: Spurred on by the carnage sweeping the battlefield, the Gork-Roara spews out great drifts of Waaagh! energy that orruks tap into – knowingly or otherwise.
abilities.declare: Pick a friendly IRONJAWZ or KRULEBOYZ WIZARD or PRIEST within 3" of this MANIFESTATION to be the target.
abilities.effect: Pick either 1 or 2 to add to casting rolls or chanting rolls for the target until the start of your next turn. Then, roll a number of dice equal to the number picked. For each 1-2, allocate 1 damage point to the target (ward rolls cannot be made for those damage points). For each 5+, until the start of your next turn, add 1 to charge rolls for friendly KRULEBOYZ or IRONJAWZ units while they are wholly within 12" of this MANIFESTATION.

warscrolls.unit_description: Morkspit Marshes are amongst the most grisly examples of orruk kunnin’. These squelchy spells transform hard earth into bogland formed of brackish waters, stinking tar, or any other disgusting substance they can think of. From them emerge tendrils of glowing protoplasm that grasp an enemies’ limbs and drag them towards their doom. With their victims otherwise occupied, the orruks can easily move in behind them and bash them across the back of the head.

abilities.name: TRICKSY FOOTING
abilities.description: Those who stagger into these eldritch quagmires must use all their strength simply to avoid being pulled under.
abilities.effect: Subtract 3 from the control scores of enemy units while they are within 6" of this MANIFESTATION.

abilities.name: GRASPING GUNGE
abilities.description: The arcane protoplasm of a Morkspit Marsh seizes limbs tight, dragging at those who draw too close.
abilities.effect: Enemy units cannot use RUN abilities while they are within 6" of this MANIFESTATION.

warscrolls.unit_description: Grikk swears that the massive, jagged bolt that buried itself in the back of his boss’s Vulcha steed had nothing to do with him. Few believed the treacherous Big Shot, so Grikk quickly took leave of his clan, accompanied by a handful of crossbow-toting lackeys and some grots to drag his beloved killbow across the realms.

abilities.name: SKEWER IT AGAIN!
abilities.description: Rather than gesture in the traditional way, Grikk uses his bolts to indicate which beastie he wants his ladz to bring down.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy MONSTER that had any damage points allocated to it this phase by a shooting attack made by the Beast-skewer Killbow in this Regiment of Renown. Then, pick any number of Man-skewer Boltboyz units in this Regiment of Renown to focus fire.
abilities.effect: For the rest of the turn, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the ranged weapons used by the units you picked to focus fire but all of their attacks must target the enemy MONSTER you picked.
abilities.when: Once Per Turn (Army), Your Shooting Phase

warscrolls.unit_description: When Swampboss Skumdrekk – wily overseer of the Murkvast Menagerie – needs to make an example of some git, he rustles up his Kountin’ Krew. These hobgrots have earned a nasty reputation chasing down those who renege on their debts to da boss, pelting them with explosive, shrapnel-laden grenades. Of course, Skumdrekk and his boyz aren’t above taking on opportunistic mercenary work from those who can afford it. After all, the chaos of battle gives them a fine chance to sneak up on the target they’re pursuing.

abilities.name: BOMBZ AWAY, LADZ!
abilities.description: Da Kountin’ Krew need only a single thumping drumbeat to start hurling their grenades.
abilities.effect: Friendly units in this Regiment of Renown can use RUN abilities and still use SHOOT abilities later in the turn while they are wholly within 12" of this Regiment of Renown’s Swampboss Skumdrekk.

abilities.name: SNATCH ’EM UP!
abilities.description: Skumdrekk and his hobgrot toadies are constantly on the lookout for new victims and beasts to snatch up.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this Regiment of Renown’s Swampboss Skumdrekk to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice. If the roll is at least double the target’s Health characteristic, 1 model in the target unit is slain.
abilities.when: Once Per Phase (Army), Enemy Hero Phase

warscrolls.unit_description:
Of all of Behemat’s spawn, Gatebreakers are the most sinister, filled with the need to destroy. More specifically, these gargants harbour considerable ill will towards the metropolises raised by Sigmar’s folk. The sight of a glorious city, with its proud spires and resolute walls, awakens a bitter fury within these creatures. With a bellow of hate, a Gatebreaker advances on an enemy settlement without fear, shrugging off panicked arrows and cannon fire with little more than a malicious chuckle.

Across the Prime Innerlands of Shyish, the name Big Drogg Fort-kicka is dreaded. Admittedly, this is as much for the Gatebreaker’s grievous halitosis – a side effect of eating decomposing corpses – as his skill at destroying cities. Drogg is known to many undead tyrants, who willingly offer him a portion of their servants to consume in return for his aid. Yet Drogg’s true goal has always been to get close enough to Nagash to clobber him in a show of strength. The Great Necromancer’s shattering at the hands of the Lumineth has set this plan back. Taking this as a personal insult, Drogg has vowed revenge. He eagerly hires his services out to any undead wishing to fight the aelves – and he has no shortage of clients.

abilities.name: GRIEVOUS HALITOSIS
abilities.description: Drogg has dined well on the spoils of war, having smashed and eaten the contents of many a fortified town – yet he has never picked his teeth clean. His breath is so foul that it can stun an ox at ten paces.
abilities.declare: Pick an enemy unit in combat with this unit to be the target.
abilities.effect: Roll a dice for each model in the target unit. For each 6, inflict 1 mortal damage on the target.
abilities.when: Once Per Turn (Army), Any Combat Phase

abilities.name: TIMBERRRRR!
abilities.description: A dying gargant is a weapon of ruin in its own right, though it is anyone’s guess where their body will fall.
abilities.effect: When the MEGA-GARGANT in this regiment of renown is slain, before removing it from play, the players must roll off. The winner picks a point on the battlefield within 3" of that model. Inflict D3 mortal damage on each unit (friendly and enemy) within 3" of that point that has a lower Health characteristic than that model.
